import { clothingList, hasBottom, hasHeadWear, hasTop, isFootWear, isVest, } from "../../../utilities"; import Clothing from "../Clothing"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const MeasurementsForm = ({ clothingOptions, setClothingOptions, setDishdashaLength, shirtType, setShirtType, setGarmentLength, setPantsLength, setShortsLength, setDressLength, setCollar, setShoulders, setSleeve, setShirtSleeve, setDressSleeve, setDescription, setSleepwearSleeve, setChest, setBelly, setWaist, setHips, setArmHole, setBicepTricep, loading, setElbow, setWrist, setInseam, setThigh, setCalf, setLegFoot, setBackWidth, setBackHeight, setSpecialOrder, setNotes, }) => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( <>

Click to select/deselect an item

{clothingList && clothingList.map((item, index) => ( ))}
{clothingOptions.length > 0 && ( <>

{clothingOptions.length}

Enter measurements below

)} {/* {clothingOptions.length > 0 && ( )} */}
{ setShirtType((e) => "Long Sleeve"); }} /> { setShirtType((e) => "Short Sleeve"); }} /> { setShirtType((e) => "Polo"); }} /> { setShirtType((e) => "T-Shirt"); }} />
setDishdashaLength(e.target.value)} /> setGarmentLength(e.target.value)} /> setPantsLength(e.target.value)} /> setShortsLength(e.target.value)} /> setDressLength(e.target.value)} /> setDressLength(e.target.value)} /> setCollar(e.target.value)} /> setShoulders(e.target.value)} /> setSleeve(e.target.value)} /> setShirtSleeve(e.target.value)} /> setDressSleeve(e.target.value)} /> setSleepwearSleeve(e.target.value)} /> setChest(e.target.value)} /> setBelly(e.target.value)} /> setWaist(e.target.value)} /> setHips(e.target.value)} /> setArmHole(e.target.value)} /> setBicepTricep(e.target.value)} /> setElbow(e.target.value)} /> setWrist(e.target.value)} /> setInseam(e.target.value)} /> setThigh(e.target.value)} /> setCalf(e.target.value)} /> setLegFoot(e.target.value)} /> setBackWidth(e.target.value)} /> setBackHeight(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default MeasurementsForm;
